name: Innovecs
description:
We are a global and dynamic software development company. We create digital solutions powered by innovative technologies and incorporate emerging trends to help businesses transform and grow.
We have earned our clients’ trust and respect by applying an individual approach to each and being responsive to all specific needs. 
 
We are experts in such domains:
Supply Chain & Logistics
Retail & Ecommerce
Healthcare
AdTech
FinTech
Gaming & Entertainment
 
Our milestones:
8 years of success on the market
600+ highly experienced engineers
offices in the US, UK, Israel, and R&D center in Ukraine
63% revenue growth in 2018
80+ satisfied clients ready to recommend our services
 
Our achievements:
World’s Top 100 IAOP Outsourcing Service Providers List
Inc. 5000 America's Fastest-Growing Companies in 2017, 2018 and 2019
Clutch Top B2B Companies 2018, Top App Developers and Web Developers 2017
DOU Top 50 Best IT companies and Top 25 Best IT Employer Companies Lists
Winner of HR Brand Award 2015, Ukraine
Our priority is to fulfill the needs of our clients and exceed their expectations regarding software development.
